oneoffs.text: Welcome to Alien Interplanetary Expedition Expert Explorers (AIEEE) Tech support and HR
Continue. I'm ready to reset the routers.
Hello <<Team RED>> AIEEE researcher and valued interplanetary employee. Thank you for contacting AIEEE Tech Support and HR. We're sorry that you're experiencing difficulties <<returning home>>.

<<Team RED>> employee. We appreciate your very important <<research>> about <<Earth humans>>. We're sorry you're experiencing difficulties <<returning home>>. Please follow these simple steps to reboot the routers by inputting data from the earth location <<San Francisco Museum of Modern Art>>
Hello <<Team BLUE>> AIEEE researcher and valued interplanetary employee. Thank you for contacting AIEEE Tech Support and HR. We're sorry that you're experiencing difficulties <<returning home>>.

<<Team BLUE>> employee. We appreciate your very important <<research>> about <<Earth humans>>. We're sorry you're experiencing difficulties <<returning home>>. Please follow these simple steps to reboot the routers by inputting data from the earth location <<San Francisco Museum of Modern Art>>.
Hello <<Team GREEN>> AIEEE researcher and valued interplanetary employee. Thank you for contacting AIEEE Tech Support and HR. We're sorry that you're experiencing difficulties <<returning home>>.

<<Team GREEN>> employee. We appreciate your very important <<research>> about <<Earth humans>>. We're sorry you're experiencing difficulties <<returning home>>. Please follow these simple steps to reboot the router by inputting data from the earth location <<San Francisco Museum of Modern Art>>.

GOOD JOB AIEEE researcher! You have reset the routers! We are satisfied with your detailed assessment of <<human art>> Please proceed to the AIEEE Administrative Headquarters on Floor 4 <<The Void>> and speak to our HR representatives immediately for a prize and your ticket home. All hail Zorg.

questions.redtext: Determine which object is the most flavorful.
questions.bluetext: Determine which object is the most << insufficient data>>
questions.greentext: Determine which object is the most <<insufficient data>>
questions.correctresponse: Excellent. We will log your response detailing <<human art>> in our "most flavorful" files.

questions.redtext: How many birds have you seen? Research suggests these are special government agents of planet Earth. If they spot you, act human or act bird.
questions.bluetext: How many <<insufficient data>>
questions.greentext: How many <<insufficient data>>
questions.correctresponse: Excellent. We are tracking the movement of these agents. However we are getting an overwhelming number of readings... there seem to be a lot of them.

questions.redtext: Find an environment <<insufficient data>>
questions.bluetext: Find an environment <<insufficient data>>
questions.greentext: Find an environment that appears to defy gravity. Perhaps this would be a good place to launch. What floor are you on?

questions.redtext: Systems indicate artwork (X) <<insufficient data>> on floor 2. Share a secret with this guardian. Who is the guardian of the secret?
questions.bluetext: Systems indicate artwork (X)(X=Guardians of the Secret) is on floor 2. Share a secret with this guardian. Who is the guardian of the secret?
questions.greentext: Systems indicate artwork (X) <<insufficient data>> is on floor 2. Share a secret with this guardian. Who is the guardian of the secret?
questions.correctresponse: Thank you. Secrets protected. All hail Zorg.

questions.redtext: All hail. It seems that humans have discovered the transformative power of the Moth. Moths love haikus. Offer a haiku (5-7-5) to ensure safe travels across the galaxy.
questions.bluetext: All hail. It seems that humans have discovered the transformative power of the Moth. Moths love haikus. Offer a haiku (5-7-5) to ensure safe travels across the galaxy.
questions.greentext: All hail. It seems that humans have discovered the transformative power of the Moth. Moths love haikus. Offer a haiku (5-7-5) to ensure safe travels across the galaxy.
questions.correctresponse: That appears to be a fitting tribute. Our administrative offices will put it into the systems for review. Continue on.

questions.redtext: Establish food source location. Which artwork can feed an gathering of around 10-20 aliens who only likes beige food? Enter last name to identify source artist.
questions.bluetext: Establish food source location. Which artwork can feed an gathering of around 10-20 aliens who only likes beige food? Enter last name to identify source artist.
questions.greentext: Establish food source location. Which artwork can feed an gathering of around 10-20 aliens who only likes beige food? Enter last name to identify source artist.
questions.incorrectresponse: This does not compute. You should be on floor 2. The chef's last name starts with A.

questions.redtext: Find gallery with <<insufficient data>> Which artwork holds the most authority?
questions.bluetext: Find gallery with <<inufficient data.>> Which artwork holds the most authority?
questions.greentext: Find gallery with even number of artworks. Which artwork holds the most authority?
questions.correctresponse: Thank you. Our AIEEE anthropoligical research has determined that each gallery in a human temple of art has been assigned a keeper.

questions.redtext: Find an artwork you can fit through in case they are portals. Enter artwork name to note for later.
questions.bluetext: Find an artwork you can fit through in case they are portals. Enter artwork name to note for later.
questions.greentext: Find an artwork you can fit through in case they are portals. Enter artwork name to note for later.
questions.correctresponse: Excellent! Don't try to jump through any artworks unless you are sure it's a portal. It sure would be embarrassing if it wasn't.

questions.redtext: It has come to our attention that AIEEE issued assimilation spacesuits are too thin for this planet. Find an artwork that looks hot and stand next to it to warm up. Are you warm yet?
questions.bluetext: It has come to our attention that AIEEE issued assimilation spacesuits are too thin for this planet. To rectify this problem, <<insufficient data>>
questions.greentext: It has come to our attention that AIEEE issued assimilation spacesuits are too thin for this planet. To rectify this problem, <<insufficient data>>
questions.correctresponse: You seem comfortable enough. We will inform HR that this uniform malfunction is not fatal and can be standardized. Thank you for justifying our budget cuts. All hail zorg.

questions.redtext: Identify an environment that represents weather patterns on planet Zod. Discuss with your fellow research employees to establish consensus. Enter the name of this hypothetical weather phenomonon.
questions.bluetext: Identify an environment that represents weather patterns on planet Zod. Discuss with your fellow research employees to establish consensus. Enter the name of this hypothetical weather phenomonon.
questions.greentext: Identify an environment that represents weather patterns on planet Zod. Discuss with your fellow research employees to establish consensus. Enter the name of this hypothetical weather phenomonon.
questions.correctresponse: Interesting. We will submit your suggestions to the administrative offices for review.

questions.redtext: Find the human substance <<insufficient data>>
questions.bluetext: Find the human substance "water." Do you think this is safe to drink?
questions.greentext: Find the human substance <<insufficient data>>
questions.correctresponse: Interesting. We would like to bring some back for further testing but antigravity forcefield containment seems... tricky.

questions.redtext: On floor 4, two small square windows look into the "seismic gap" between the Botta and Snohetta buildings by the elevators. The code is just beyond those windows. Enter authorization code in format UPCODE __/__/__
questions.bluetext: On floor 4, two small square windows look into the "seismic gap" between the Botta and Snohetta buildings by the elevators. The code is just beyond those windows. Enter authorization code in format UPCODE __/__/__
questions.greentext: On floor 4, two small square windows look into the "seismic gap" between the Botta and Snohetta buildings by the elevators. The code is just beyond those windows. Enter authorization code in format UPCODE __/__/__
questions.correctresponse: Authorization code received. All hail Zorg.
questions.incorrectresponse: You should be looking for numbers on a pipe in the gap between two buildings. You should be able to see it in a strangly placed window on Floor 4. Ask a human guide if you're unable to locate it.

questions.redtext: Previous expeditions have indicated that human artwork can be overwhelming. Please find a calming gallery to avoid systems overload. On a scale from 3-7 how calm are you now?
questions.bluetext: Previous expeditions have indicated that human artwork can be overwhelming. Please find a calming gallery to avoid systems overload. On a scale from 3-7 how calm are you now?
questions.greentext: Previous expeditions have indicated that human artwork can be overwhelming. Please find a calming gallery to avoid systems overload. On a scale from 3-7 how calm are you now?
questions.correctresponse: Thank you. AIEEE Tech support will log this  for our records.

questions.redtext: Remember that time? Of course you do! Name an artwork that evokes that time.
questions.bluetext: Remember that time? Of course you do! Name an artwork that evokes that time.
questions.greentext: Remember that time? Of course you do! Name an artwork that evokes that time.
questions.correctresponse: Ohhh THAT time. This was not what HR had in mind but the data is valid. Thank you for updating our AIEEE collective memory database.

questions.redtext: On floor 5, you will find a grouping of human figures. Discuss with other AIEEE employees to establish who among this human society is their healer. Introduce yourselves, and reassure them you mean no harm. Document their response.
questions.bluetext: On floor 5, you will find a grouping of human figures. Discuss with other AIEEE employees to establish who among this human society is their healer. Introduce yourselves, and reassure them you mean no harm. Document their response.
questions.greentext: On floor 5, you will find a grouping of human figures. Discuss with other AIEEE employees to establish who among this human society is their healer. Introduce yourselves, and reassure them you mean no harm. Document their response.
questions.correctresponse: Thank you for your excellent diplomatic service.

questions.redtext: Proceed to Floor 5 Gallery 5.36.  As a courtesy, find the employee at this facility that works hard 24/7 to keep our most important system cool and functioning. You will recognize this employee by <<insufficient data>>
questions.bluetext: Proceed to Floor 5 Gallery 5.36.  As a courtesy, find the employee at this facility that works hard 24/7 to keep our most important system cool and functioning. You will recognize this employee by their circulation of air. Please say hello and submit a word of encouragement from AIEEE headquarters.
questions.greentext: Proceed to Floor 5 Gallery 5.36.  As a courtesy, find the employee at this facility that works hard 24/7 to keep our most important system cool and functioning. You will recognize this employee by <<insufficient data>>
questions.correctresponse: Your words of encouragement were well-recieved. We shall give this employee a 2 percent raise and/or title upgrade next quarter. All hail Zorg.

questions.redtext: The Intergalactic Travel Agency mandates that all travelers sync to soundwave patterns matching frequencies by a human rock group called <<insufficient data>>
questions.bluetext: The Intergalactic Travel Agency mandates that all travelers sync to soundwave patterns matching frequencies by a human rock group called <<insufficient data>>
questions.greentext: The Intergalactic Travel Agency mandates that all travelers must sync to the frequencies of songs created by a human rock group called “The Beatles”. Find the device on Level 5 that broadcasts this frequency and enter the name of the agent (4 letters) in charge for permission to sync.
questions.correctresponse: Transmission received. Account representatives in our admistration offices inisit that they "would be Paul." but argue that "there can only be one Paul".
questions.incorrectresponse: You may have answered a different artist. Our data requires the name "Paik". We will let this pass with only a minor flag on your employee record.

questions.redtext: Please find and test some alternative modes of transport. Systems indicate there might be a "plane," a "boat," a "golden portal" or "a colorful tunnel" in your vicinity. Check to see if they are functional.
questions.bluetext: Please find and test some alternative modes of transport. Systems indicate there might be a "plane," a "boat," a "golden portal" or "a colorful tunnel" in your vicinity. Check to see if they are functional.
questions.greentext: Please find and test some alternative modes of transport. Systems indicate there might be a "plane," a "boat," a "golden portal" or "a colorful tunnel" in your vicinity. Check to see if they are functional.
questions.correctresponse: Thank you for your helpful suggestions. Zorg willing, we will reboot the router and alternate forms of transportation will not be necessary

questions.redtext: You should be able to see your boarding gate from the big windows in the City Gallery on Floor 6. In addition to having technical issues, we can't seem to locate our pilot. His name is Waldo. Can you find him?
questions.bluetext: You should be able to see your boarding gate from the big windows in the City Gallery on Floor 6. In addition to having technical issues, we can't seem to locate our pilot. His name is Waldo. Can you find him?
questions.greentext: You should be able to see your boarding gate from the big windows in the City Gallery on Floor 6. In addition to having technical issues, we can't seem to locate our pilot. His name is Waldo. Can you find him?

questions.redtext: In order to reboot the router, we will need Extraterrestrial Material in the form of “Meteor” and “Tellurium". Find the guardian of these materials. He's in a yellow room with candles. Enter the earth year that “Meteor” and “Tellurium" materials were established.
questions.bluetext: In order to reboot the router, we will need Extraterrestrial Material in the form of “Meteor” and “Tellurium". Find the guardian of these materials. He's in a yellow room with candles. Enter the earth year that “Meteor” and “Tellurium" materials were established.
questions.greentext: In order to reboot the router, we will need Extraterrestrial Material in the form of “Meteor” and “Tellurium". Find the guardian of these materials. He's in a yellow room with candles. Enter the earth year that “Meteor” and “Tellurium" materials were established.
questions.incorrectresponse: You should be looking for "The Guardian" by Sigmund Polke. Meteor and Tellurium can be found in the same gallery.
